# Issue 29812: FormalPolyhedraModule: support infinite bases

archive/issues_029575.json:
```json
{
    "body": "... in particular the free modules \n- generated by all polyhedra\n- generated by all lower-dimensional polyhedra\n- generated by all polyhedra with lines\n\nVia #19448, all finitely generated formal polyhedra modules can be expressed as submodules.\n\n\n\nCC:  @tscrim\n\nAuthor: Matthias Koeppe\n\nBranch: u/mkoeppe/formalpolyhedramodule_infinite_bases\n\nStatus: new\n\nDependencies: #29801, #19448\n\nCommit: f6500b1007aec48af296ef3e666b2d7edab23952\n\nIssue created by migration from https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/29812\n\n",
    "created_at": "2020-06-06T02:22:29Z",
    "labels": [
        "component: geometry"
    ],
    "milestone": "https://github.com/sagemath/sagetest/milestones/sage-9.8",
    "title": "FormalPolyhedraModule: support infinite bases",
    "type": "issue",
    "url": "https://github.com/sagemath/sagetest/issues/29812",
    "user": "https://github.com/mkoeppe"
}
```
... in particular the free modules 
- generated by all polyhedra
- generated by all lower-dimensional polyhedra
- generated by all polyhedra with lines

Via #19448, all finitely generated formal polyhedra modules can be expressed as submodules.



CC:  @tscrim

Author: Matthias Koeppe

Branch: u/mkoeppe/formalpolyhedramodule_infinite_bases

Status: new

Dependencies: #29801, #19448

Commit: f6500b1007aec48af296ef3e666b2d7edab23952

Issue created by migration from https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/29812

<a id='comment:2'></a>
Wondering if I should expect that modules generated by subfamilies of some basis coerce into the module generated by the basis.

Or perhaps I should be constructing every module explicitly as a submodule of the ambient infinite-dimensional module?
